name: Dragon's Lair
description: Within the heart of a forbidding mountain range, the Dragon's Lair lies shrouded in mystery and danger. Ancient legends speak of a fearsome dragon that guards untold treasures, its fiery breath and colossal might presenting a formidable challenge for any who dare approach. The Crusaders stand at the precipice, ready to face this legendary adversary and claim victory for their cause.

matches.name: Distract with Fireworks
matches.description: Launch a dazzling display of fireworks to momentarily distract the dragon, allowing your group to evade its fiery assault.

rewards.name: protection
rewards.description: Evade the dragon's attack for 1 turn.

matches.name: Rain of Arrows
matches.description: Rain a barrage of arrows upon the dragon, exploiting its vulnerability and weakening its defenses.

matches.name: Bolster the Defenses
matches.description: Strengthen your group's defenses by fortifying your positions, shielding yourselves from the dragon's attacks.

rewards.name: protection
rewards.description: Gain enhanced protection for 2 turns, reducing incoming damage.

matches.name: Lure with Bait
matches.description: Lay out a tempting feast to lure the dragon's attention away from your group, giving you a tactical advantage.

rewards.name: protection
rewards.description: Evade the dragon's attack for 1 turn.

matches.name: Fatal Blow
matches.description: Seize a moment of vulnerability to deliver a fatal blow to the dragon, vanquishing the ancient menace once and for all.

rewards.name: monument
rewards.description: Erect a monument to your victory, providing a permanent upgrade to your group's strength.
